Battalion: Daemon Cohort of Khorne (Open Play)
Battalion: Goreblade Warband (Open Play) [Khorne Starter Set Battalion]
Vorgaroth the Scarred & Skalok the Skull Host of Khorne
Battle Tactics: For the Skull Throne
Khorne Warscroll Battalion: Tyrants of Blood
Regiment of Renown - The Coven of Thryx

characteristic.__text: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made by this unit is 6 and the target is a HERO, that attack causes 1 mortal wound to the target in addition to any damage it inflicts.
Melee
You can re-roll charge rolls for units from this battalion while they are wholly within 16" of any BLOODTHIRSTERS from the same battalion.

If this unit is included in a Blades of Khorne army, each time a model in this unit is slain, you can make 2 murder rolls instead of 1.

1 in every 10 models in this unit can be an Icon Bearer. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of this unit while it includes any Icon Bearers.

If an unmodified save roll for an attack made with a melee weapon that targets a unit that includes any models armed with a Goreaxe and Gorefist is 6, the attacking unit suffers 1 mortal wound after all of its attacks have been resolved.

1 model in this unit can be a Chieftain. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model's melee weapons.
Add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made with melee weapons while this unit is wholly within 16" of any friendly KHORNE TOTEMS.
1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Hornblower. Add 1 to charge rolls for this unit while it includes any Hornblowers.
1 in every 10 models in this unit can be an Icon Bearer. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of this unit while it includes any Icon Bearers.

Melee

Once per battle, at the start of the combat phase, you can pick 1 friendly unit on the battlefield with this ability to plant its Icon of Khorne.  If you do so, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly BLADES OF KHORNE units on the battlefield until the end of that phase.

If this unit issues the Rally command (core rules, 7.2) to a friendly BLOODBOUND unit with a Wounds characteristic of 3 or less, you can return 1 slain model to that unit for each 4+ instead of each 6.
Melee

At the start of your movement phase, you can pick up to D3 other friendly BLOODBOUND units within 3" of this unit and a roll a dice for each of those units.  Regardless of the roll, that unit can run and still charge later in the turn, but on a roll of 1 it also suffers 1 mortal wound.
Melee
Melee

The Murderous Charge and Slaughterous Charge abilities used by units from this battalion automatically inflict mortal wounds after a model finishes a charge move, instead of inflicting mortal wounds on a roll of 2+.

1 Lord of Khorne on Juggernaut
3-7 Mighty Skullcrushers units
You can use the Rejoice in the Slaughter command ability of the Charnel Hosts Bloodthirster of Unfettered Fury once in each of your hero phases without spending a command point to do so.
In each of your hero phases, you can pile in and attack with any units from a Charnel Host that are within 3" of an enemy unit and within 8" of their battalion's Bloodthirster of Unfettered Fury.
Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by BLOODREAVERS units from this battalion while they are wholly within 16" of a SLAUGHTERPRIEST from the same battalion.
This unit has a ward of 5+.
Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by this unit while it is wholly within 8" of another friendly BLOODBOUND unit that is a general.
Melee

If the unmodified save roll for an attack made with a melee weapons that targets a unit armed with a Ruinous Axe and Skullgouger is 6, the attacking unit suffers D3 mortal wounds after all of its attacks have been resolved.
Melee

If this unit is included in a Blades of Khorne army, at the end of the combat phase, if this unit is on the battlefield and any enemy models were slain by attacks made by this unit in that phase, you receive 1 additional Blood Tithe point.
Melee
Enemy units cannot receive the Inspiring Presence command while they are within 3" of any friendly units with this ability.
Each time an enemy model is slain by an attack made by this unit, you can heal 1 wound allocated to this unit.
If this unit is included in a Blades of Khorne army, when this unit destroyed, you can make 5 murder rolls instead of 1.
Missile
Melee
This unit can attempt to unbind 1 spell in the enemy hero phase in the same manner as a WIZARD.
This unit is eligible to fight in the combat phase if it is within 8" of an enemy unit instead of 3" and it can move an extra 5" when it piles in.

If this unit is included in a Goretide army, once per battle, at the start of the combat phase, you can say that Khul will unleash the wrath of the Goretide.  If you do so, until the end of that phase, each time a friendly GORETIDE BLOODBOUND model is slain, you can make 1 additional murder roll.
This unit's Flesh Hound, Grizzelemaw, is armed with Blood-dark Claws.

Each time this unit fights, wounds caused by its Blood-dark Claws must be allocated before wounds caused by its Axe of Khorne.  At the end of any phase, if any wounds caused by this unit's Axe of Khorne in that phase where allocated to an enemy model and that enemy model has not been slain, roll a dice.  On a 5+, that enemy model is slain.
Melee
Melee
This unit has a ward of 5+ against mortal wounds caused by spells and mortal wounds caused by the abilities of endless spells.
After this unit makes a charge move, pick 1 enemy unit within 3" of this unit and roll a dice. On a 2+ that enemy unit suffers 3 mortal wounds.

Once per battle, at the start of the charge phase, you can say this unit will declare a Brass Stampede.  If you do so, until the end of that phase, you can re-roll charge rolls for this unit and friendly MIGHTY SKULLCRUSHER units wholly within 16" of this unit.
Melee

You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase.  This unit must issue the command and the unit that receives the command must be a friendly GORECHOSEN unit.  The strike-first effect applies to that GORECHOSEN unit until the end of the phase.
Melee
Melee
This unit can attempt to unbind 1 spell in the enemy hero phase in the same manner as a WIZARD.
1 model in this unit can be a Skullhunter. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model's Bloodglaive or Ensorcelled Axe.

After a model in this unit makes a charge move, pick 1 enemy unit and roll a dice for each model in this unit that is within 3" of that enemy unit.  For each 2-4, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.  For each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 2 mortal wounds.
This unit has a ward of 5+ against mortal wounds caused by spells and mortal wounds caused by the abilities of endless spells.
1 in every 3 models in this unit can be a Hornblower. Add 1 to run and charge rolls for this unit while it includes any Hornblowers.
1 in every 3 models in this unit can be a Standard Bearer. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of this unit while it includes any Standard Bearers.
Melee
Melee
Each time an enemy HERO or MONSTER is slain by an attack made by a unit from this battalion, you receive 1 additional Blood Tithe point.

Red Headsmen always count as being within range of their Skullgrinder's Altar of Skulls ability. In addition, if the Skullgrinder slays a worthy foe, the range of his Altar of Skulls ability is doubled.
This unit can attempt to unbind 1 spell in each enemy hero phase in the same manner as a WIZARD.
This unit is eligible to fight in the combat phase if it is within 8" of an enemy unit instead of 3", and can move an extra 5" when it piles in.
Melee
Melee
D3

At the end of the movement phase, if this unit has been slain, roll 2D6. On an 8+ you can set up this unit anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" away from an enemy units and with no wounds allocated to it.
The Attacks characteristic of the Bloodstorm Blades is either 5, or equal to the number of enemy models within 3" of the attacking unit (whichever is higher).
If this unit is included in a Blades of Khorne army, you can make 1 additional murder roll each time a model from a friendly WRATHMONGERS unit within 8" of this unit is slain.
Melee

Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unit's Brazen Anvil for attacks that target an enemy MONSTER.  In addition, if any wounds caused by this unit's Brazen Anvil are allocated to an enemy MONSTER, the strike-last effect applies to the enemy MONSTER until the end of that phase.

At the end of deployment, you can pick 1 other friendly BLOODBOUND HERO within 8" of this unit to have their weapon tempered.  If you do so, pick 1 of that HERO's melee weapons.  Improve the Rend characteristic of that weapon by 1 until the end of the battle.  The same unit cannot be picked to have their weapon tempered more than once in the same battle.
Melee
1 model in this unit is a Skullseeker.  A Skullseeker is armed with a Vicious Mutation in addition to Daemonforged Weapons.
Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by this unit if the target unit has 5 or more models.
If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with this unit's Daemonforged Weapons is 6, that attack causes 1 mortal wound to the target in addition to any damage it inflicts.
1 in every 5 models in this unit can be an Icon Bearer. Add 1 to charge rolls for this unit while it includes any Icon Bearers.

entryLink._name: Herald of Khorne on Blood Throne

selectionEntryGroup._name: 1  Herald of Khorne on Blood Throne

characteristic.__text: Skullreapers from a Skulltake are in a frenzied fury whilst they are within 12" of the battalion's Bloodstoker. If the wound roll for a Skullreaper in a frenzied fury is 6 or more, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of the weapon they are using for that attack. If the Skulltake contained the maximum number of units at the start of the battle, then this ability applies to all Skulltake units that are within 12" of the Bloodstoker.
The Skulltake's Khorgoraths make 8 attacks with their Claws and Fangs rather than 5, as long as their unit is within 6" of any of the battalion's Skullreapers.

selectionEntryGroup._name: 0-2 units chosen in any combination from the following list:

characteristic.__text: This unit can attempt to unbind 1 spell in the enemy hero phase in the same manner as a WIZARD.
If answered, pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the chanter. That enemy unit suffers D6 mortal wounds.
Melee
Melee

Add 3 to the Bravery characteristic of other friendly BLOODBOUND units while they are wholly within 16" of this unit.  However, friendly BLOODBOUND unit cannot retreat while they are wholly within 16" of this unit.
This unit has a ward of 5+.
Melee
1 model in this unit can be a Wrathmaster. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model's melee weapons.

Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly BLADES OF KHORNE units while they are wholly within 8" of any units with this ability. This ability has no effect on WRATHMONGERS.
If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a melee weapon that targets this unit is 1, the attacking unit suffers 1 mortal wound after all of its attacks have been resolved.
Melee
If this unit is included in a Blades of Khorne army, each time a model in this unit is slain, you can make 2 murder rolls instead of 1.

The first time this unit is set up on the battlefield, you must summon 1 FLESH HOUNDS unit consisting of 1 model to the battlefield and it to your army.  That model must not be a Gore Hound and must be on a 50mm base. Set up that FLESH HOUNDS unit wholly within 3" of this unit and more than 9" from all enemy units.
If the unmodified save roll for an attack made with a melee weapon that targets this unit is 6, the attacking unit suffers 1 mortal wound after all of its attacks have been resolved.
Melee
D3
Subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of enemy units while they are within 12" of this model.
At the end of the combat phase, if any enemy models were slain by wounds inflicted by this models attacks in that combat phase, you can heal up to D3 wounds allocated to this model.
Subtract 2 from casting rolls for enemy WIZARDS while they are within 12" of this model.
If this model is slain, before removing it from play, roll a dice for each enemy model within 3" of this model. On a 4+, that models unit suffers 1 mortal wound. This model is then removed from play.
Add 1 to charge rolls for friendly KHORNE units that are wholly within 12" of this model.

D6
Melee
Melee

In your hero phase, a Murderband's Slaughterpriest can pray for a Murderous Blessing in addition to using his Bloodfuelled Prayers.  If he does so, roll a dice. If you roll a 3 or more, until your next hero phase you can re-roll failed wound rolls made for him and other units from his Murderband that are within 8". On a 1, however, he suffers a mortal wound.
In your hero phase, pick one unit from this battalion that is within 8" of Skarr Bloodwrath and within 3" of an enemy unit. The unit you pick can immediately attack as if it were the combat phase.

selectionEntryGroup._name: 1 Aspiring Deathbringer with Goreaxe and Skullhammer

characteristic.__text: You can add 1 to any wound roll made in the combat phase for a model in a Daemon Cohort of Khorne if its unit charged that turn.
Roll a dice at the end of the combat phase for each unit in this battalion that wiped out an enemy unit during that phase; on a 6, that unit can immediately pile in and attack again.

selectionEntryGroup._name: 1 Bloodthirster of Insensate Rage, Bloodthirster of Unfettered Fury, Wrath of Khorne Bloodthirster or Khorne Daemon Prince

selectionEntryGroup._name: 1 Blood Throne of Khorne, Herald of Khorne or Herald of Khorne on Juggernaut
1 unit of Flesh Hounds, Skull Cannons of Khorne or Bloodcrushers of Khorne

selectionEntry._name: Battalion: Daemon Cohort of Khorne (Open Play)

characteristic.__text: If any HERO from a Bloodmarked Warband slays an enemy model in the combat phase, then all other units from that warband within 16" become filled with an unstoppable blood rage. Add 1 to the Attacks of any melee weapons used by those units for the rest of the combat phase.
[...] If the number of models in a unit from a Bloodmarked Warband is a multiple of 8 when it is first set up, you can re-roll wound rolls of 1 for the unit for the duration of the battle.

If a HERO from this warband is slain, pick another model in the warband that is not a HERO. That model adds 1 to the Attacks of all its melee weapons, becomes a HERO, and is treated as a separate unit for the rest of the Battle.
In each of your hero phases, pick one Slaughterband unit that is within 3 of the enemy. All models in the unit you pick can immediately pile in and attack with Hellblades and Blades of Blood.

entryLink._name: Herald of Khorne on Blood Throne

characteristic.__text: You can re-roll charge rolls for the Goreblade Warband if any of its units made a successful charge in the same phase.
If any units are wiped out during the combat phase, you can add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of all melee weapons used by the Goreblade Warband for the remainder of that combat phase.

profile._name: Khorne Cares Not From Whence The Blood Flows

selectionEntry._name: Battalion: Goreblade Warband (Open Play) [Khorne Starter Set Battalion]

characteristic.__text: Add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made with this models Skull Cleaver Axe of Khorne that target a MONSTER. In addition, if the unmodified wound roll for an attack made with the Skull Cleaver Axe of Khorne is 6, that attack causes D3 mortal wounds to the target in addition to any damage it inflicts.
Roll a dice for each enemy unit that is within 1" of this model after this model makes a charge move. On a 2+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

Instead of setting up this model on the battlefield, you can place it to one side and say that it is in reserve. If you do so, at the end of your second movement phase, you must set up this model anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

Once per battleshock phase, before you take a battleshock test for a friendly KHORNE unit wholly within 12" of this model, you can say that this model demands unwavering obedience. If you do so, 1 model in that unit is slain, but you do not have to take a battleshock test for that unit in that phase.

In your hero phase, you can pick 1 friendly model within 3" of this model and roll a dice. If you do so and the roll is equal to or greater than that models Wounds characteristic, that model is slain and you can heal a number of wounds allocated to this model equal to the slain models Wounds characteristic.
Subtract 3 from casting and unbinding rolls for enemy WIZARDS that are within 18" of this model.

selectionEntry._name: Vorgaroth the Scarred & Skalok the Skull Host of Khorne

characteristic.__text: Melee
If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Hellblade is 6, that attack inflicts 1 mortal wound on the target in addition to any normal damage.

Once per battle, at the start of your hero phase, you can remove Karanak and one or more units from this battalion wholly within 12" of Karanak from the battlefield, and then set them up again within 12" of Karanak's quarry and more than 9" from any enemy units.  Units that are set up in this way cannot move in the subsequent movement phase.
You can re-roll chanting rolls for friendly BLADES OF KHORNE PRIESTS wholly within 8" of this terrain feature.
While any terrain feature with this scenery rule is on the battlefield, if a spell is miscast, the caster suffers D6 mortal wounds instead of D3.
This terrain feature is a defensible terrain feature that can be garrisoned by 1 HERO with a Wounds characteristic of 8 or less.
While a BLADES OF KHORNE PRIEST garrisons this terrain features, double the range of any prayers it chants to summon invocations.

If answered, set up this invocation wholly within range and visible to the chanter, and more than 1" from all models, other invocations and endless spells. Only BLADES OF KHORNE PRIESTS can attempt to summon this invocation.
After this invocation is set up and at the start of each of their hero phases, the commanding player can move this invocation as if it were a model with a Move characteristic of 8" and that can fly.

Units cannot receive the Inspiring Presence command while they are within 8" of this invocation.  In addition, if a units a battleshock test within 8" of any Bleeding Icons, roll a dice.  On a 1-5, add D3 to the number of models that flee.  On a 6, add D6 to the number of models that flee, and then this invocation is removed from play.  This ability has no effect on KHORNE units.

If answered, set up the parts of the invocation wholly within range and visible to the chanter, within 8" of each other and more than 1" from all models, other invocations and endless spells. Only BLADES OF KHORNE PRIESTS can attempt to summon this invocation.

After this invocation is set up and at the start of each of their hero phases, the commanding player can move the parts of this invocation as if they were models with a Move characteristic of 8" and that can fly. After the parts have been moved, they must be within 8" of each other.

Subtract 2 from casting rolls for WIZARDS that are within 8" of any Hexgorger Skulls. In addition, if a WIZARD within 8" of this invocation attempts to cast a spell and the unmodified casting roll is 8, then that casting attempt is not successful, that WIZARD no longer knows that spell, each WIZARD within 8" of this invocation suffers D6 mortal wounds, and then this invocation is removed from play.

If answered, set up this invocation wholly within range and visible to the chanter, and more than 1" from all models, other invocations and endless spells. Only BLADES OF KHORNE PRIESTS can attempt to summon this invocation.
After this invocation is set up and at the start of each of their hero phases, the commanding player can move this invocation as if it were a model with a Move characteristic of 8" and that can fly

After this invocation has moved, roll a dice for each unit that has any models it passed across. On a 2+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. Then, the commanding player can pick 1 unit within 3" of this invocation and roll a dice. On a 1, nothing happens. On a 2-5, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. On a 6, that unit suffers D6 mortal wounds, and then this invocation is removed from play.
Pick 1 enemy unit within 8" of your Skull Altar. You complete this battle tactic if that unit is destroyed during this turn.
Pick 1 enemy WIZARD HERO on the battlefield. You complete this battle tactic if that HERO is slain during this turn.
Pick 1 friendly unit. You complete this battle tactic if 8 or more enemy models are slain by attacks made by that unit during this turn.
You complete this battle tactic if 4 or more units were destroyed during this turn.

Pick 1 friendly unit within 3" of any enemy units.  You complete this battle tactic if that unit fights in the combat phase of this turn and at the end of that phase there are no enemy units within 3" of that unit.
You complete this battle tactic at the end of this turn if all friendly BLADES OF KHORNE units on the battlefield are within 8" of any enemy units.

selectionEntry._name: Battle Tactics: For the Skull Throne

characteristic.__text: This unit can attempt to unbind 1 spell in the enemy hero phase in the same manner as a WIZARD.

If answered, pick 1 point on the battlefield within range and visible to the chanter and draw a straight line between that point and the closest part on the chanter's base. Roll a dice for each enemy unit passed across by that line. On a 2+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
Melee
While this unit is wholly within 3" of a friendly DROMM, he has a ward of 4+.
At the end of the combat phase, roll a dice for each enemy model within 3" of this unit's Skullgrinder Herax. For each 5+, that enemy models unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
Melee

At the end of the combat phase, if this unit includes the Gorehulk, you can pick 1 enemy model within 3" of this unit and roll a dice. If the roll is more than double that models Wounds characteristic, it is slain.
Melee
1 in every 8 models in this unit must be a Packlord. Add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of that models melee weapons. In addition, a Packlord can issue commands to their own unit.
2 in every 8 models in this unit must be a Brutaliser. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of those models melee weapons.
1 in every 8 models in this unit must be a Hound of Wrath. A Hound of Wrath is armed with Gouge-claws instead of Weapons of the Hunt. In addition, add 1 to that models Wounds characteristic.
After deployment but before the first battle round begins, this unit can make a normal move.
Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by this unit while they are wholly within 8" of any friendly FLESH HOUNDS units.
Melee
Melee

If answered, pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the chanter.  Until the start of your next hero phase, subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristics of that unit's melee weapons (to a minimum of 1).

Once per battle, at the end of your movement phase, you can pick 1 objective or terrain feature within 3" of this unit and say that it has been marked with desecrating blood runes.  If you do so, until the end of the battle, add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made with melee weapons by friendly BLOODBOUND units while they are wholly within 8" of that objective or terrain feature.
Melee
D6
5-8 GORECHOSEN units

0-1 Mighty Lord of Khorne

selectionEntry._name: Brass Stampede - 1 Lord of Khorne on Juggernaut

characteristic.__text: If any units are wiped out during the combat phase, you can add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of all melee weapons used by this battalion for the remainder of that combat phase.

profile._name: Khorne Cares Not From Whence The Blood Flows

characteristic.__text: Units from the the Bloodbound Warhorde can attempt to unbind one spell (or one additional spell if they could already do so) in each enemy hero phase in the same manner as a wizard. If a Mighty Lord of Khorne or a SLAUGHTERPRIEST from the Warhorde successfully unbinds a spell, you immediately earn one Blood Tithe point.
You immediately gain 1 Blood Tithe point at the start of each of your hero phases.

If the save roll for an attack that targets a unit with any Gorefists is 4+ (after re-rolls and modifiers are applied), and the attacking unit is within 1" of the target unit, roll a dice. On a 6, the attacking unit suffers 1 mortal wound after all of its attacks have been resolved.
Melee
You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made by units in this battalion that made a charge move in the same turn.
Improve the Rend characteristic of melee weapons used by units in this battalion by 1 if they made a charge move in the same turn.
